sentences.en: Strategically we should despise all our enemies, but tactically we should take them all seriously.
sentences.cn: 在战略上我们要藐视一切敌人，在战术上我们要重视一切敌人。

sentences.en: Attempting to resolve this contradiction, Harris concludes that Fern employed flowery rhetoric strategically to disguise her subversive goals beneath apparent conventionality.
sentences.cn: 为了解决这一矛盾，哈里斯得出结论，弗恩战略性地使用华丽的修辞，在显见的常规之下掩盖她的颠覆目的。

sentences.en: The parking areas in the town are few, but strategically placed.
sentences.cn: 城内停车场虽少，但都设在关键地方。
